body_html:
I'll fix the docs for this later.

@zchky The behavior for this the add function is a little funky because a non-named argument comes after a named one. You shouldn't give names for input and other when calling, so
torch.add(a, 0.1, a) is good. When you leave out the value 0.1, it's inferred that when you're calling torch.add(a, b), value is 1.
